name: Goldjaw's 1st Gaffe
description:
Zoom: To zoom in the game, zoom in your web browser (Ctrl++). Also works in full screen mode.

Controls: Use the ARROW KEYS and keyboard Z to MOVE and INTERACT, respectively. Use keyboard X to bring up the MENU or CANCEL. 

If you want to use a game pad, map these keys Z -> A, X -> B, and ARROWS to joystick.

Credits

Made with RPG Maker MZ. 

Plugins:

Theo_DisableTouchUI https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/disable-touch-ui-mz.126888/

MechPen_SharpText https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/sharp-text-mz-mv.132598/

N_Pixelate https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/n_pixelate.126636/
